description: Learn Temperature and Top-P Explained in one minute.

hook.text: Your chatbot gives creative answers when you need facts. One knob fixes that.

buildup.text: Temperature controls randomness. Low = predictable, high = creative.

discovery.text: Top-P trims unlikely tokens. A top_p of 0.1 keeps only the safest 10% of options.
